verses.roman:
prabhure dekhiyā mleccha karaye vicāra
ei yati-pāśa chila suvarṇa apāra

synonyms: prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhiyā—seeing; mleccha—the Mohammedans; karaye vicāra—considered; ei yati-pāśa—within the possession of this sannyāsī; chila—there was; suvarṇa apāra—a large quantity of gold.
translation: Seeing the Lord unconscious, the soldiers thought, "This sannyāsī must have possessed a large quantity of gold.
